mapper.sql:
where status != '-1'
and ( gymc like '%${keyword}%' or zdmj like '%${keyword}%' or gyjb like '%${keyword}%' or zgbmmc like '%${keyword}%' or gydz like '%${keyword}%' or lxdh like '%${keyword}%')
and gymc like '%${gymc}%'
and zdmj like '%${zdmj}%'
and gyjb like '%${gyjb}%'
and zgbmmc like '%${zgbmmc}%'
and gydz like '%${gydz}%'
and lxdh like '%${lxdh}%'
and status = #{status}
mapper.select: select id,gymc,zdmj,gyjb,zgbmmc,gydz,lxdh,bz,addTime,status from dz_slgy where status != '-1' order by id desc
select id,gymc,zdmj,gyjb,zgbmmc,gydz,lxdh,bz,addTime,status from dz_slgy order by ${orderby} limit #{start_num,,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{page_size,,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into dz_slgy( id, gymc, zdmj, gyjb, zgbmmc, gydz, lxdh, bz, addTime, status ) values( #{id}, #{gymc}, #{zdmj}, #{gyjb}, #{zgbmmc}, #{gydz}, #{lxdh}, #{bz}, #{addTime}, #{status} )
mapper.update: update dz_slgy set gymc=#{gymc}, zdmj=#{zdmj}, gyjb=#{gyjb}, zgbmmc=#{zgbmmc}, gydz=#{gydz}, lxdh=#{lxdh}, bz=#{bz}, addTime=#{addTime}, status=#{status} where id=#{id}
update dz_slgy set status = #{status} where id in (${ids})
update dz_slgy set status = '-1' where id in (${ids})
